languages.text: "У тебя есть лекарство, а по моему кораблю гуляет болезнь?"
"So you have the cure, yet the disease continues to roam free aboard my ship?"
languages.original_text: "У тебя есть лекарство, а по моему кораблю гуляет болезнь?"

traits.locale_text: "So you have the cure, yet the disease continues to roam free aboard my ship?"
"So you have the cure, yet the disease continues to roam free aboard my ship?"
"So you have the cure, yet the disease continues to roam free aboard my ship?"
"So you have the cure, yet the disease continues to roam free aboard my ship?"
"So you have the cure, yet the disease continues to roam free aboard my ship?"
"So you have the cure, yet the disease continues to roam free aboard my ship?"
"So you have the cure, yet the disease continues to roam free aboard my ship?"

languages.text: "Ihr habt also das Heilmittel, aber die Seuche breitet sich dennoch auf meinem Schiff aus?"
languages.original_text: "So you have the cure, yet the disease continues to roam free aboard my ship?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt also das Heilmittel, aber die Seuche breitet sich dennoch auf meinem Schiff aus?"

languages.text: « Ainsi donc, vous avez le remède en votre possession, mais la maladie continue à sévir librement à mon bord ? »
languages.original_text: "So you have the cure, yet the disease continues to roam free aboard my ship?"

traits.locale_text: « Ainsi donc, vous avez le remède en votre possession, mais la maladie continue à sévir librement à mon bord ? »

languages.text: «¿Entonces dispone de una cura, y sin embargo la enfermedad sigue causando estragos en mi nave?».
languages.original_text: "So you have the cure, yet the disease continues to roam free aboard my ship?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Entonces dispone de una cura, y sin embargo la enfermedad sigue causando estragos en mi nave?».

languages.text: 「つまり、治療法はあるのに、病は私の船で蔓延し続けているというのか？」
languages.original_text: "So you have the cure, yet the disease continues to roam free aboard my ship?"

traits.locale_text: 「つまり、治療法はあるのに、病は私の船で蔓延し続けているというのか？」

languages.text: “也就是说，你这里明明有药，可这种病症依然在我的船上到处肆虐？”
languages.original_text: "So you have the cure, yet the disease continues to roam free aboard my ship?"

traits.locale_text: “也就是说，你这里明明有药，可这种病症依然在我的船上到处肆虐？”

languages.text: "Yani elinizde tedavi var ama bu hastalık gemimde serbestçe yayılmaya devam mı ediyor?"
languages.original_text: "So you have the cure, yet the disease continues to roam free aboard my ship?"
